prompt: Transparent PNG of pastel Minecraft-like voxel clouds for a website hero background. Clouds should feel like they can sit behind UI elements, not just a corner frame.
subject: pastel voxel clouds
style: Minecraft-like voxel/pixel illustration (original, not using any official assets), soft dithering, clean edges, restrained
composition: wide hero background; place clouds in the upper third and lower third with gentle overlap toward the center; avoid hard framing at extreme corners; keep a readable central safe area but not empty; avoid placing cloud clusters within a central 35% circle
palette: warm cream/off-white clouds with pale sky-blue shadows and faint warm-gold tint
constraints: transparent background/alpha; clouds only; soft alpha falloff at cloud edges; no text; no watermark; no logos; no characters; no terrain; no buildings
negative: photorealistic; realistic sky; heavy grain; lens flare; neon; clutter; text

prompt: Transparent PNG of chunky pastel voxel cloud clusters that can be layered over a website hero section. Make clouds more centrally placed (upper-middle and lower-middle), not only at the edges.
subject: chunky pastel voxel clouds
style: soft voxel/pixel cloud blocks, slightly chunkier, subtle dithering
composition: wide hero; clouds arranged like drifting bands; 10-15% inset from all edges; leave clear center for logo/cards; keep some wisps crossing behind the center edges for cohesion
palette: cream + very light gray-white; pale blue shadows; tiny warm-gold tint
constraints: transparent background; clouds only; no text; no watermark; no logos; no characters
negative: photography; busy noise; harsh sharpening; strong bloom; text

prompt: Transparent PNG of airy pastel voxel clouds with a gentle swirl motion across the midline, leaving room for a central logo but still feeling integrated.
subject: pastel airy voxel clouds
style: gentle voxel blocks with rounded silhouettes, minimal detail, subtle pixel dithering
composition: wide hero; clouds sweep diagonally across the middle third; keep a central safe zone for logo; avoid corner-only framing; keep edges lighter
palette: warm off-white clouds; pale blue cool shadows; soft cream highlights
constraints: transparent background; clouds only; no text; no watermark; no logos; no terrain
negative: photorealistic; high contrast; neon; heavy grain; lens flare; text

prompt: Transparent PNG of very light pastel voxel cloud wisps that can be used behind a hero header. Keep it subtle and not border-framed.
subject: pastel wispy voxel clouds
style: lighter, airier voxel cloud wisps, subtle dithering, minimal
composition: wide hero; thin cloud wisps across top-middle and bottom-middle; big open center; avoid heavy corners; avoid thick border frame
constraints: transparent background; clouds only; no text; no watermark; no logos; no characters
negative: photography; noisy texture; heavy bloom; text

prompt: Transparent PNG overlay for a website hero: a soft band of pastel voxel clouds concentrated at the TOP, fading to fully transparent by the middle.
subject: top cloud overlay band
style: soft voxel/pixel cloud blocks, clean UI overlay
composition: cloud mass in top 30-40% of canvas; smooth alpha gradient fade downward; leave center area mostly clear
palette: warm cream/off-white clouds with pale blue shadows
constraints: transparent background; clouds only; must fade to transparent toward the middle; no text; no watermark

prompt: Transparent PNG overlay for a website hero: a soft band of pastel voxel clouds concentrated at the BOTTOM, fading to fully transparent by the middle.
subject: bottom cloud overlay band
style: soft voxel/pixel cloud blocks, clean UI overlay
composition: cloud mass in bottom 30-40% of canvas; smooth alpha gradient fade upward; leave center area mostly clear
palette: warm cream/off-white clouds with pale blue shadows
constraints: transparent background; clouds only; must fade to transparent toward the middle; no text; no watermark
